organization.description:
Abriendo Puertas, has been serving our communities for 18 years providing human and social services in the following areas:

Child and Youth Development After School and Summer Program in East Little Havana and in North Miami Beach offering academic reinforcement in reading/literacy,social skills, physical fitness, karate and dance
